text:
NIH had research on #Chloroquine since 2005...
“Chloroquine...relatively safe...effective...cheap...is effective in inhibiting the infection and spread of SARS CoV in cell culture.” Why not use prophylactically for healthcare workers? #SARS-CoV-2 #COVID19
